common_violations.violation: Do not use the 'int' standard integer type
common_violations.fix: Use sized types like int32_t, uint16_t, etc. from <cstdint>

common_violations.violation: User-declared 'move constructor' should have a 'noexcept' specifier
common_violations.fix: Add 'noexcept' to move constructor: Account(Account&&) noexcept = default;
Use smart pointers: std::unique_ptr or std::make_unique

common_violations.violation: Do not use a C-style cast
Prefer 'nullptr' to '0' as the null pointer value
Do not cast pointer type to integral type 'bool'
common_violations.fix: Use bool operator or explicit null check: if (ptr != nullptr)

common_violations.violation: Do not use the 'using' directive in the global namespace
common_violations.fix: Use explicit qualification or using declaration instead of using namespace

common_violations.violation: There is no 'default' label in a switch statement
common_violations.fix: Add default case to all switch statements
